title: Text-aria
behaviorsList: Ensure the text area is responsive and works well on various devices and screen sizes.
Ensure the text area is keyboard navigable and supports screen readers with appropriate ARIA roles and labels.
The text area will initially show only 5 lines. Clicking on it will expand the box to display the full content.
Fixed positions will not expand; instead, a scrollbar will appear if there are more than 5 lines.
The text area should be editable inline.
Ensure the text area has a clear focus state to indicate it is active.
If needed, Provide a character count limit and display the remaining characters dynamically.
Implement auto-save functionality to prevent loss of data.
Support basic text formatting options like bold, italic, and underline.
